oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Holly Ridge Cemetery: Governor Barbour
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of Governor Barbour speaking at a podium next to a covered sign
The dedication of this cemetery as the first marker of the Mississippi Blues Commission particularly honored Charley Patton and his important role in the blues genre.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cemeteries -- Tennessee
Blues music; Cemeteries
